summary:
This mod replaces all of the holds guards' shields' logos with the intenet's favorite Meme Faces.

Including the Troll, F**k yeah, challenge accepted and many more.
descriptionHtml:
I made this simple mod as a joke while waiting for some meshes to texture from a friend.

NOT LORE FRIENDLY (duh)

Please don't hate, this is my first uploaded mod.

All likenesses of other mods are completely coincidental. I made this mod with no other inspiration.
author: LordDucksworth AKA Blackopsfreak115
